question: Fourth Step is to add any number from 1 to 9
To Calculate how much money do your friend have, we eleminate last number of Final answer
After Eleminating Last digit of final answer, we need to Substract is to get the money (Answer)
If your friend consider zero Rupees, his/her final answer would be from 51 to 59
If your friend consider 50 Rupees, his/her final answer would be Rs 551 to 559
If your friend consider Rs 100, his/her final answer would be Rs 1001 to 1000
If your friend consider Rs 1, his/her final answer would be Rs 61 to 69
